sentence.Network_en: Some people are often reproached for unpunctuality when their only fault is cutting things fine.
sentence.Network_cn: 有的人因不准时而受到指责,这时他们唯一的过失就是把时间抠得太紧了.

sentence.Network_en: But people are often reproached for unpunctuality when their only fault is cutting things fine.
sentence.Network_cn: 然而人们常常由于不准时而受到指责,这时他们唯一的过错是把时间抠得太紧.

sentence.Network_en: I shall have to report your unpunctuality to the Manager.
sentence.Network_cn: 我将向经理告发你不守时.

PerfectNetExp.abs: unpostable 无法调配unpunctuality 不守时unqualified approval 无附带条件的批准
这个句子不完整阿unpunctuality是不守时cutting things fine 应该是说掐着点儿赶到。
Moreover , habitual unpunctuality leads to indolence and even waste of life ., 此外 , 经常不准时会导致怠惰甚至浪费生命.

list.abs: Sometimes a strict regulation is indispensable to penalize unpunctuality due to the inertia of people ., 有的时候由于人的惰性一个严格的制度对惩罚不守时是必不可少的.
如果你严守时间unpunctual adj. 不准时的condition n. A mode or state of being

I hate unpunctual person ., 我讨厌不守时的人.

auth_sentence.content: My selfish carelessness and unpunctuality, he wrote Treece, I do not try to excuse as poet's properties.
